home.title: Your Day, Your Choice, Your Music
home.description: Welcome to our music selection platform! Customize your listening experience based on your preferences and mood. Explore curated playlists and discover new tracks that resonate with you.
home.description1: Provide us with your preferences and musical tastes to tailor your experience.
home.description2: Add your favorite tracks to our platform to create a personalized music library.
home.description3: Edit, delete, or rearrange your tracks to keep your collection organized and up-to-date.
home.description4: Select your top tracks and add them to your Favorites page for easy access and listening.
home.alert1: To add card: fill out two forms in order.
home.alert2: To add user or song to playlist : fill out the forms depending on your needs.

favorites.title: Mark some Cards To create your own Playlist
